about_the_game:
A Chosen Apostle, Can You Survive the Tribulation?

It all began at the turn of the millennium, a gentle shadow began to fill the countryside of Hyrinthia. All but the Apostles failed to notice the corrupting nature of the dark forces encroaching on this unsuspecting nation. The royal family fell to its seductive venality first, and then the commoners, and lastly the beasts of the earth. With few left to challenge this unknown adversity, it is up to you - a stranger to these shores, to find the Fellowship of Apostles and vanquish the evil from these lands. But beware, most are darkened, depraved of mind, and will stop at nothing to prevent you from uncovering the truth of their new masters.

Core Features

  • Strategic turn-based combat pits you against a variety of enemies ranging from physical to the spiritual.

  • Rogue-lite style permadeath for you and your mercenary hires along with a global meta-progression to avoid total loss after death.

  • Basic survival elements such as eating, drinking, and sleeping.

  • Robust map menu system for location tracking and easy-to-find points of interest.

  • Exquisite hand-drawn environments, maps, and sketched-style portraits.

  • An advanced lighting system creating an ominous atmosphere; travel at night at your own peril.

  • A day/night cycle that influences encounters and loot drops.

  • A total of 957 weapons, apparel, and items along with armor set bonuses.

  • Lore-rich codex featuring an in-depth look at enemies and characters.

  • Intricately written story-line with many twists and turns.

  • An expansive open-world filled with many combat instances with random engagements and treasures.
detailed_description:
Roadmap to the Demo

After 2 1/2 years of development, we are proud to announce that we're on the home stretch to a Demo release! Our announcement contains a list of action items in chronological order that must be completed before the Demo can be released to the public.

During that time, we will be updating the Roadmap Scroll check boxes as we complete each task. Around the months of April/May of 2025, look for a Closed Public - Beta Testing sign up announcement where you can be one of the few to test the Demo before its release and get your name in the final game credits. ;)

short_description: Age of Tribulation is a dark fantasy, open-world survival roguelite. Explore a massive world full of dangers in turn-based combat. With permadeath (optional) and a day/night cycle, study the codex and learn your enemies or meet certain death.
